summary: The speaker explains that calories determine body weight, and macronutrients determine body composition. They also mention that micronutrients, vitamins, and minerals affect how a person feels and operates, allowing them to optimize their performance.
transcript: Calories determine your body weight. Macronutrients determine your body composition. What is fat? Lean tissue versus fat tissue. Your vitamins and minerals, that will determine how you feel, and how you operate, and how you really optimize things.
